resources.string: "This is the first version of Suspend. It is aimed at android drivers who wish to stop interruptions from their mobile phone while they are driving."
"As it is the first version, bugs are inevitable but if you do find a bug kindly contact me, una.hennessy4@mydit.ie with a synopsis of the bug and I will fix it as soon as possible"
"Remember, it only takes a few seconds of distraction to become a statistic! Don't lose concentration because of a tweet, text message or status update!"

string.name: welcome_txt
string.b: Suspend! Distraction Free Driving saves lives!"

resources.string: "Setup your automatic Reply message or use ours below. Tap on the message to edit."
This app lets you: setup an automatic reply to let friends and colleagues know you are driving and that you will get back to them later."
Suspend! will not allow texts, WhatsAPPs etc to distract you from driving."
"I'm driving and can't respond just now. I will get back to you soon."
Which features do you want to set on automatic Reply?
Reply messages will be sent to mobile callers. If the caller is from a land-line, the app will redirect to voice-mail.
To activate an automatic Reply for your WhatsAPP account, please confirm your username and password.
"Great! Your settings are saved. If you want to change any of them please click on the settings button on the Home Screen."
While Suspend! is active, automatic replies will be sent from the WhatsAPP account and the phone account associated with Suspend!
Click on Continue to turn on Suspend and start using it now!
"Activate Suspend! every time you drive for Distraction Free Driving!"
Suspend! status: ON" To exit the app and use your phone functions, turn off Suspend! by tapping the S! above."
"Suspend! is now ready to use. Tap the S! to turn it on. Obviously phone functionality will be limited while app is enabled."
112 Emergency" Are you sure you want to make an emergency call?"
Select your Music source for Quick Access.
Select your Navigation source for Quick Access.
INFORMATION"WhatsAPP is not configured on this phone. Please set up WhatsAPP first."
Music Quick Access"Please turn Suspend! "OFF to select your Music Source for Quick Access.
Navigation Quick Access"Please turn Suspend! "OFF to select your Navigation Source for Quick Access.

"In order to use Suspend! Please accept the following Terms and Conditions: The Suspend! Application is an aid to distraction free driving. It has not been tested, approved or certified by the Irish Government or any private agency for use in connection with driving while using a phone. It is illegal to text or otherwise have your phone in your hand while you are driving in Ireland and if caught you may be sanctioned with penalty points or otherwise. It is up to you the driver to ensure you are focused on the road at all times and using this app does not preclude you from paying attention to the road.
IF YOU AGREE WITH THESE TERMS AND CONDITIONS, PLEASE CLICK THE ACCEPT BUTTON."

string.name: home_txt
string.b: Thank you for downloading Suspend!, The app that helps you drive safely. 1st time in, click Agree button to set yourself up for distraction free driving"

resources.string: "Click on About button to find out more on Suspend! "
Thanks for using Suspend! and for driving safely!
"Setup Saved for next time you use Suspend!"
"Don't like our default message, change it here!
